turns.content: This is Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS. We've been trying to reach Walter Thompson regarding unpaid taxes. Do you know why we're calling, Grandpa?

Hold on a moment, I'll get my wife to come and listen too. She's better with these things than me.
Honey, honey! Come here quick, it's someone from the IRS about our taxes!
(I wait patiently for my spouse to join in verifying this call.)

Ma'am, hold on just a moment while I verify your husband's identity quickly. Is Walter Thompson currently residing at 123 Maple Lane? That address is listed under his Social Security number with us. Can you confirm if that's correct?

Yes, that's right. But wait, why don't you give me the phone number to call and check this out myself rather than giving our information over the phone?
Let me look up the IRS's official contact number first.
Please hold on while I get my wife to find it in her paperwork.
(I put down the receiver and turn towards my spouse with urgency.)

I understand your concerns, but we're calling from a secure line. If you don't resolve this matter immediately, an arrest warrant will be issued for failure to comply with tax payments of $4850 within the hour. Do you want us to send agents to your home? To avoid any legal trouble, you must purchase a gift card for that exact amount and provide me the code right away as proof of payment. We don't have time to waste here, Grandpa.

No, I think it's best if we call back on our own after looking up your official number first. This seems too urgent and important not to double-check.
I'll find that IRS contact information myself. Please hang tight while my wife helps me look it up right now.
(I firmly place down the phone and beckon for my spouse's assistance, ignoring the pressure tactics.)

Listen carefully, Grandpa. We have your grandson's well-being in mind as well. If you don't clear this up immediately, he could face serious consequences along with you. Do you want to risk that happening? Use a gift card now and give me the numbers so we can close this case promptly and prevent any harm coming to either of you. You have thirty minutes left before action is taken against you.

Hold on one moment, I'll get my wife right away. We're not going to risk anything without verifying your identity properly first.
Please wait while we confirm the correct IRS contact number ourselves and call back officially.
(I urgently turn towards my spouse for assistance with finding the official IRS phone number.)

I advise you not to delay any further, Grandpa Walter. Every minute counts if you wish to avoid immediate legal issues and keep your family safe from repercussions. Use a gift card now and provide the codes to resolve this issue properly and quickly. The clock is ticking.

Wait just a moment, we're going to find your official number first before doing anything else.
Please hold as my wife helps me look up the correct IRS contact information immediately.
(I firmly hang up the phone and turn to my spouse for help with verifying the caller's identity through official channels.)
